title: Jungle monster nerfs on the pbe
body:
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/03/32-pbe-update.html

Crimson Raptor
•Damage reduced to 45 from 55
Raptor
•Damage reduced to 16 from 20

Murk Wolf
•Gold increased to 16 from 12

Greater Murk Wolf
•Gold increased to 53 from 42

Gromp
•Damage reduced to 83 from 90

I guess Riot must of fired there balance team and got a new one.
